Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.io.file.tfile

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.io.file.tfile 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.io.file.tfile  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.io.file.tfile used by org.apache.hadoop.io.file.tfile 
    Class and Description
    BCFile.BlockRegion
    Block region.
    BCFile.DataIndex
    Index of all compressed data blocks.
    BCFile.MetaIndex
    Index for all Meta blocks.
    BCFile.MetaIndexEntry
    An entry describes a meta block in the MetaIndex.
    BCFile.Reader
    BCFile Reader, interface to read the file's data and meta blocks.
    BCFile.Reader.BlockReader
    Access point to read a block.
    BCFile.Reader.RBlockState
    Intermediate class that maintain the state of a Readable Compression Block.
    BCFile.Writer
    BCFile writer, the entry point for creating a new BCFile.
    BCFile.Writer.BlockAppender
    Access point to stuff data into a block.
    BCFile.Writer.BlockRegister
    Call-back interface to register a block after a block is closed.
    BCFile.Writer.WBlockState
    Intermediate class that maintain the state of a Writable Compression Block.
    ByteArray
    Adaptor class to wrap byte-array backed objects (including java byte array) as RawComparable objects.
    Chunk.ChunkDecoder
    Decoding a chain of chunks encoded through ChunkEncoder or SingleChunkEncoder.
    CompareUtils.BytesComparator
    A comparator to compare anything that implements RawComparable using a customized comparator.
    CompareUtils.Scalar
    Interface for all objects that has a single integer magnitude.
    Compression.Algorithm
    Compression algorithms.
    MetaBlockAlreadyExists
    Exception - Meta Block with the same name already exists.
    MetaBlockDoesNotExist
    Exception - No such Meta Block with the given name.
    RawComparable
    Interface for objects that can be compared through RawComparator.
    SimpleBufferedOutputStream
    A simplified BufferedOutputStream with borrowed buffer, and allow users to see how much data have been buffered.
    TFile.Reader
    TFile Reader.
    TFile.Reader.Location
    Location representing a virtual position in the TFile.
    TFile.Reader.Scanner
    The TFile Scanner.
    TFile.Reader.Scanner.Entry
    Entry to a <Key, Value> pair.
    TFile.TFileIndex
    Data structure representing "TFile.index" meta block.
    TFile.TFileIndexEntry
    TFile Data Index entry.
    TFile.TFileMeta
    Data structure representing "TFile.meta" meta block.
    TFile.Writer.State
    Writer states.
    TFileDumper.Align 
    Utils.Version
    A generic Version class.
